duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform cash handling, fuel transactions, cleaning, and stocking duties in a retail environment.
Engage in food preparation and ensure foodservice safety in foodservice positions.
Provide excellent customer service and maintain a positive attitude while interacting with customers.
Participate in training programs to enhance skills and excel in the role.
Maintain cleanliness and ensure a safe environment in the store.
Promote loyalty programs and handle fuel transactions and cash effectively.
Occasionally lift up to 50 pounds and perform repeated bending, standing, and reaching.
